article:
On Timmy's thirteenth birthday, he got many presents. Timmy's uncle gave him a special present. It was a trap   for catching birds.
One day, Timmy wanted to catch a bird. He put his _ in the garden, stood by and hoped that some birds flew down. However, the birds were _ of him and would not come near the trap. Then, Timmy left. After dinner, he went to the _ again and saw a little bird in the trap. Timmy put the bird in a cage. He  _ it with food and water and cleaned the cage. A few days later, Timmy forgot to _ the cage door after he changed the water. The bird came out and flew _ the room toward the window. Timmy tried to make it fly back into the cage. Unluckily, he hurt the bird _ . Timmy felt very _ , so he looked after it carefully in his free time. One day when Timmy went to bed, the bird died. Timmy could not _ well at night for a long time because of the loss of the bird. He always thought of the dying bird  _ he closed his eyes. After that Timmy didn't catch birds any more.
